channel.title: Server or Client?
channel.description:
Hi, I downloaded the server/client(don't know which one it is) at the top of this page and I dont know what else to download because I can't make a global object or anything, I can only make npcs and I can't even make shops???
Help me find out what to do next, Please?
Is the download at the top of the previous page a server or client? the one called "MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan". Anyone know?

item.title: Server or Client?
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Sorry, this is the wrong section.

Next time please look through the different topics, and select the one thats approipreate for the topic.

So next time this question would go in server help or client help(becuase it is a question regarding both).

-Will
